Book Your Tour

Contact us via email or phone to secure your spot. We'll send confirmation details and track your flight.

Airport Arrival & Meet-Up

Land at SEA, clear customs, and meet your guide at baggage claim with a personalized sign.

  • ‚Ä¢Your guide meets you at baggage claim with a sign
  • ‚Ä¢We help coordinate luggage storage if needed ($10-15 per bag)
  • ‚Ä¢Quick briefing on the day's itinerary and timing

üöó

Transportation to Downtown

Your guide coordinates Uber/Lyft rides and accompanies you downtown. Relax and enjoy the ride!

  • ‚Ä¢Guide handles all ride coordination and payment logistics
  • ‚Ä¢Travel time: ~30 minutes to downtown Seattle
  • ‚Ä¢Learn about Seattle during the scenic drive

üéØ

Explore Seattle

Visit Pike Place Market, see the fish toss, explore the waterfront, and enjoy curated local experiences.

  • ‚Ä¢Pike Place Market tour with insider knowledge
  • ‚Ä¢Watch the famous fish throwing demonstration
  • ‚Ä¢Waterfront stroll with Space Needle views
  • ‚Ä¢Optional add-ons: local food, coffee, or extended sightseeing
5
‚è∞

Return to Airport

With a guaranteed 2-hour buffer, we ensure you're back at SEA with plenty of time for your next flight.

  • ‚Ä¢Departure timed with 2-hour buffer before your flight
  • ‚Ä¢Guide accompanies you back to the airport
  • ‚Ä¢Drop-off at the correct terminal for your departure

Transportation Details

Here's what you need to know about getting around

üöó

Ride Service

Transportation is arranged through Uber/Lyft ride-share services with $1 million liability coverage per ride.

  • ‚Ä¢ We handle all coordination and logistics
  • ‚Ä¢ Professional drivers with full insurance
  • ‚Ä¢ Direct airport-to-downtown service
üß≥

Luggage Storage

SEA Airport offers secure Smarte Carte storage for $10-15 per bag (paid directly to storage provider).

  • ‚Ä¢ We guide you through the storage process
  • ‚Ä¢ Secure, monitored storage facility
  • ‚Ä¢ Easy retrieval upon return
